entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:03 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 6:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: calm km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 5 cm. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to a few flurries near noon. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 80 in the morning then northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
